channel.title: Posts on Spectre
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Spectre

item.title: hugo-blog make
item.description: 0x00:hugo安装 添加至path 0x01:site新建并简单配置hugo，修改toml file hugo server -D hugo本地服务器查看 0x02: hugo new posts/my-first-post.md draft : true -> draft : false 0x03:打包至/docs文件夹 hugo -d docs 0x04:在docs文件夹下commit git remote add origin git@github.com:xxx/xxx.github.io.git git add . git commit -m '' git push origin master
